review: this doesn't really do anything that I can't do with my android tablet or smartphone. For some reason, my TV won't release the HDMI input that the Chromecast was plugged into - it cannot be used for a different input until it has been unplugged for some time. And it screws up an HDMI switch I bought to use multiple inputs with a single HDMI port. Nothing else will work until the TV has "forgotten" the Chromecast. It's only $35, but you probably don't need it.

review: This thing is cool. I can control from my iphone or laptop. Make sure to read up on how it works so you know what you are getting. While you control it with your phone or computer it actually connects directly to the internet through wifi. So instead of your phone or computer streaming a show or movie and then sending the signal to your tv, you start by streaming on your phone or tv, but then once you press the button that connects your device to the chromecast, the chromecast will pick up the signal from the internet and start streaming so that you can even turn your device off and the show will keep playing. It won't mirror your device but if you get the chrome browser it will bassically mirror whatever you are browsing.
